review: Dr Manju Wali is great. As always. She explains the problem in detail and offers practical solutions.

This was my first delivery and I have to say that if you want a really genuine doctor who takes your health  seriously and advises you accordingly ,you should must visit Dr. Manju Wali.she is extremely humble and soft spoken doctor and I really love her for that!

I have booked appointment for my family member and we have visited the hospital. ****** *** **** **** *** she have done the check up. After the check up she had explained us all the thing in details so that we can understand very easily. There was some wait time for us in hospital and we had to wait for 40 to 50 mins and over all we are 85% satisfied by her. I would like to recommend this doctor for my friends and family members also.

I had booked an appointment for 7.30 p.m. 
I along with my wife reached there at 7.20 sharp. We found out that our token number is 16 and the token number going on at 7.20 was 7.
Each patient was taking 25 minutes and there was NO COMPUNDER OR ASSISTANT to answer about waiting time. There was no sitting arrangement for pregnant ladies, hardly 2-3 ladies could sit. No AC or water. This was my first and bad experience ever. I strictly do not recommend this doctor.

Hope no one else experiences the same.

I was reach on mam Clinic after my brother suggestion bcoz there was some misguide advice by any other doctor afraid me but Manju Wali mam give a warm and Cool advice and due to mam observation I have got my life my Little Angel with normal Delivery. *** ***** **** ******** *** *** ** ***** ********* *** ** ****** ** **** ***** **** * **** *****

review: *** ** *** **** ****  I have followed her every advice and delivered a baby normally.. though you need to wait to see her as she has lots of patients but inspite of so much rush will give you time and understand all your concerns and queries...
